backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing removal of footer version text and listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend Tambola feature files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment instructions for building and deploying the Tambola app using Node, pnpm, and dfx.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata, favicon, root div, and loading the React main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app layout combining Tambola game state, controls, history, and voice features without showing a version label.
frontend/src/features/tambola/components: Draw, reset, and auto‑draw control panel with cooldowns, dialogs, and interval slider.
Scrollable grid showing called numbers in reverse order with highlighted most recent entry.
Wrapper combining last‑number display and call‑history panel.
Management UI for recording, previewing, and deleting host voice clips for numbers 1–90.
Card showing the last drawn number or game‑complete state in a large circular display.
Renders a button that opens a confirmation dialog and triggers onNewGame when confirmed.
Displays a 1–90 grid highlighting called numbers using a styled card layout.
Provides 15 input fields to verify entered numbers against called numbers and shows success or error results.
UI panel to toggle voice announcements and configure reading mode, voice priority, and voice manager access.
frontend/src/features/tambola/storage.ts: Handles localStorage persistence and initialization of game state and auto-draw settings.
frontend/src/features/tambola/types.ts: Defines types for Tambola game state, auto-draw settings, persisted state, and game actions.
frontend/src/features/tambola/useTambola: React hook managing game logic, state transitions, auto-draw timers, and persistence.
frontend/src/features/tambola/verify/par: Parses comma/space‑separated user input into unique valid numbers between 1–90.
Parses spoken transcripts into up to 15 normalized numbers, handling words, digits, and compound forms.
Provides SpeechSynthesis voice loading, English voice selection, match checking, and text‑to‑speech playback.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/type: Defines types for voice announcement settings, reading modes, priorities, and playback steps.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useH: Hook providing microphone recording for number announcements and saving audio clips to IndexedDB.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useS: Hook wrapping browser SpeechRecognition to capture transcripts with error handling and start/stop controls.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useV: Controls spoken number announcements by sequencing TTS and recorded clips based on reading mode and priority.
Manages voice feature settings and persists them via localStorage.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/voic: Utility for initializing audio context and playing or stopping audio blobs with cleanup.
IndexedDB store for saving, loading, listing, and deleting recorded number audio clips.
Loads and saves voice settings to localStorage with default fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and login/logout via Internet Identity using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus theme variables for light/dark modes and background theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/release/liveVersion.ts: Defines constants for the current live draft version and its deployment date.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, noting a fix request to remove outdated “Draft 34” text from the footer and listing related feature metadata.
